title: Tristin and Isolde: A Retelling of the Legend
description: Here is the story of Isolde, a beautiful Irish princess, and the two men who love her - the splendid King of Cornwall and his nephew Tristin, a knight torn between loyalty and passion. Start reading and discover the power of this timeless legend, the quintessential medieval love story, as retold by Anne Kinsey.
author: Anne Kinsey
